verbs.description: [V: jcps] [ARG1: racial equity] policy approved after head of teachers union called impediment to black student achievement raoul cunningham president of the louisville naacp branch said minorities and underprivileged students have long received lesser educational opportunities leading to lesser opportunities for suc racial equity advisory council jerry stephenson diane porter jefferson county public schools kentucky raoul cunningham local school district brent mckim marty pollio joint center for political and economic studies louisville kentucky
